prodNameC: 宙斯抗核抗體免疫檢驗系統
ingredientsDesc:
1. Multiplexed bead suspension 5.5 mL bottle. The suspension contains separate distinguishable 5.6 micron polystyrene beads that are conjugated with the following autoantigens: SSA, SSB, Sm, U snRNP, B/B, U1 snRNP 68, U1 snRNP A, U1 snRNP C, Scl-70, Jo-1, Centromer B, dsDNA, Histone H, and Histone HLY. An additional bead set is included that contains an antigen preparation derived from HEp-2 cells.
2. Phycoerythrin conjugated goat anti-human IgG (r chain specific). 15 mL amber bottle.
3. Human positive serum controls. Three, 0.2mL vials.
4. Human negative serum control. One, 0.2mL vial.
5. Sample diluent. One 50mL bottle containing phosphate-buffered-saline.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 針對人類血清中8種不同分析物(包括 SSA、SSB、Sm、RNP、Scl-70、J0-1、中心粒B以及組織蛋白)的IgG抗體做半定量的偵測，人類血清中的dsDNA的IgG抗體做定量檢測，以及ANA的IgG抗體做定量檢測。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5100 抗核抗體免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 200 EVANS WAY BRANCHBURG, NEW JERSEY 08876, U.S.A.
